about_the_game:
Welcome to the unforgiving battlefields of World War II, where survival is a brutal fight against relentless enemies and the horrors of war. This top-down shooter plunges you into the grim, blood-soaked chaos of history's deadliest conflict. With visceral combat, an oppressive atmosphere, and hard-hitting gunplay, every moment is a fight to endure the carnage.

Brutal Gunplay

Master authentic WWII weaponry, from bolt-action rifles to devastating machine guns. Each weapon feels heavy, realistic, and deadly, requiring precision and skill to overcome ruthless foes.

Dark, War-Torn Environments

Battle across diverse and destructible landscapes, including bombed-out cities, frozen trenches, and scorched forests. Each location is steeped in grim details, immersing you in the harrowing reality of war.

Relentless Enemies

Face unforgiving enemies that adapt to your strategies. Flanking, suppressing fire, and relentless aggression mean you’ll need to think and react quickly to survive.

Grim Atmosphere

This is war in its most brutal form. Blood stains the ground, bodies litter the battlefield, and the haunting cries of conflict surround you. The oppressive visuals and sound design ensure every moment feels raw and real.

Challenging Solo Campaign

Take on missions that push you to your limits, testing your tactics, accuracy, and survival instincts in a world where every decision can mean life or death.

Hardcore Difficulty

This is not a casual shooter. Limited ammo, realistic damage, and relentless combat make every fight a challenge to overcome. Victory must be earned.

Prepare yourself for an uncompromising experience of war’s darkest moments. There are no heroes here—only survivors. Will you endure the chaos and carve your name into history, or will the horrors of war consume you?

content_descriptors.notes:
Warning: Intense Violence & Gore

This game contains graphic depictions of violence, blood, and gore. Player discretion is advised. Not suitable for children or those sensitive to violent content.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core Intel Core i5-3470 (4 * 3200) or equivalent / AMD FX-8350 (4 * 4000) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 ( 2048 MB) / Radeon R9 390X (8192 MB)
  • Additional Notes: Minimum Specification listed above allows gameplay experience close to 30 FPS on average while using 1080p resolution and lowest settings

short_description: Enter the brutal battlefields of World War II in this grim, blood-soaked top-down shooter. Fight your way through relentless enemies with brutal gunplay, gritty visuals, and intense, unforgiving combat. Every bullet counts as you move through the trenches, leaving a trail of destruction and gore.
